page.title: 09Religion in Denny & Dunipace
page.content: Our area is served by 6 churches - The {Church of Scotland,}which was once the dominant religion of Scotland, has 4 buildings,{the Roman Catholics}have 1 and{the Baptists}have 1. St Alexanders with its membership of 3570 Catholics has recently had to be extended to cope with the large congregation. Much of the work was done by the parish priest and his parishioners. Although different in their approach to religion members of these churches frequently come together for joint services of worship. Over the last decade the{ecumenical movement}has been quite strong here. In June 1985 we had a walk from Dunipace to Denny ending with an open air service of praise and hymn singing.Members of the clergy and parishioners of all six churches took part.
